name: Business Enterprise Research and Development Survey aggregate estimates, by questionnaire reference: 2022
description: Business Enterprise Research and Development Survey aggregate estimates, by questionnaire reference: 2022

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: value
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of U.S. dollars and thousands of employees

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded $50,000 or more of R&D and are not comparable with estimates published for years prior to 2018.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, Business Enterprise Research and Development Survey, 2022.
